descricao.titulo: Designing with love for over 10 years
descricao.texto: I’m a User Interface/Product Designer with 14 years of experience crafting clean, user-centered designs for mobile apps, web platforms, and landing pages. My journey has taken me through collaborations with cross-functional teams and a diverse range of clients, from innovative startups to established brands. I’m passionate about turning complex problems into intuitive and visually stunning experiences. Always proactive and committed to growth, I stay ahead of the curve with the latest tools, technologies, and design trends. I believe that continuous learning fuels creativity and helps me keep the magic alive in my designs. When I’m not designing, you might find me drawing, painting, and traveling.
